attributes.action: either allow market forces, on contractually, the electorate to set MPs salary and expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would avoid some of the self - interest criticisms alleged in the current controversy. On the subject of pay - why haven't I received mine, nor my travel expenses, nor my resources spent for the class I taught for the British govt ? I thought the purpose of parliament was representation and legislation ?!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
